name: Adventures Of Tom Sawyer - Addictive Endless Game for Boys & Girls
name_original: Adventures Of Tom Sawyer - Addictive Endless Game for Boys & Girls
description:
'Adventures Of Tom Sawyer' is an action game starring the lovable hero Tom Sawyer as he runs,jump and destroys enemies and hurdles with nothing to lose!

Travel through portals to visit exotic world locations.
Instantly playable and simple to control, the action speeds up and changes gears with every new world.

Run as far as possible and jump along the way to amass high scores and collect awards. Upload your best runs to the GameCenter leader board.

Collect Coins to unlock new characters and Powers.
